MAN.TITLE: get
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Retrieve a property value from an User Interface object.

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: h : integer the handle of the object to retrieve a property
Bprop : character string name of the property
val : scilab object value of the property

DESCRIPTION.P: This routine can be used to retrieve a specified property from a GUI object. Property name are character strings like 'style', 'position' .... This routine returns the value associated to the specified property. Obviously, the type of the returned object depends on the property one aims at querying. For example, the 'style' property which represents the kind of Object the UI control is (ie button, label, list, ..... ) will be represented as a string. On the contrary, the 'position' property, which represents the geometrical aspect of the UI control, will be coded as a [1,4] vector.

MAN.AUTHOR: Bertrand Guiheneuf
